message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.CV, cs.CL. 

The paper deals with active learning of general concept classes, which is a topic that falls under the umbrella of machine learning. The use of the splitting index as a parameter for upper and lower bounds is a common technique in the field of computational learning theory, which is closely related to machine learning. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning). 

The paper also mentions the use of algorithms and empirical performance evaluation, which are common themes in sub-categories such as cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms), cs.CV (Computer Vision), and cs.CL (Computation and Language). These sub-categories are also closely related to machine learning and are therefore likely candidates.
